channel.title: Asian News International (ANI) | New Delhi | Facebook RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an RSS feed of the three most recent posts at https://www.facebook.com/ANINEWS.IN/

item.title: "Stop treating woman as a commodity…" Shabana Azmi condemns
item.description: "Stop treating woman as a commodity…" Shabana Azmi condemns Kolkata doctor rape-murder case #ShabanaAzmi #KolkataDoctorCase #Actress

item.title: ‘To develop Jharkhand, save existence of tribals,’ says Cham
item.description: ‘To develop Jharkhand, save existence of tribals,’ says Champai Soren on joining BJP #ChampaiSoren #Jharkhand #BJP

item.title: Uttar Pradesh के Bahraich में हत्यारे भेड़ियों का आतंक, सात
item.description: Uttar Pradesh के Bahraich में हत्यारे भेड़ियों का आतंक, सात की मौत, MLA ने rifle थामे की रखवाली #WolfAttack #Bahraich #UttarPradesh
